video.title: Black Lightning
video.synopsis: School principal and retired superhero Jefferson Pierce leaps back into action as the legendary Black Lightning after a gang threatens his family.

episodes.synopsis: When his two daughters run afoul of a violent gang, Garfield High principal Jefferson Pierce has no choice but to use his long-abandoned superpowers.
episodes.title: The Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson's feud with Lala heats up as a former student seeks help rescuing her daughter from the gang. Anissa puzzles over her newfound strength.
episodes.title: LaWanda: The Book of Hope

episodes.synopsis: As Reverend Holt urges citizens to take to the streets in protest, Jefferson and Gambi scramble to protect the marchers from the wrath of the 100.
episodes.title: LaWanda: The Book of Burial

episodes.synopsis: While Jefferson tries to find out who’s behind a scary new street drug, Lady Eve gives Tobias an ultimatum, and Anissa puts her powers to use.
episodes.title: Black Jesus

episodes.synopsis: A suit upgrade gives Jefferson new powers but takes a toll on his body. Anissa looks into the exposé her grandfather was writing when he died.
episodes.title: And Then the Devil Brought the Plague: The Book of Green Light

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson's quest to take out Tobias leads to a moment of reckoning. Anissa joins a protest at a monument. Jennifer wrestles with doubts about Khalil.
episodes.title: Three Sevens: The Book of Thunder

episodes.synopsis: While police investigate the break-in at the lab, Lynn and Jefferson debate Anissa's future. Gambi teams up with Lady Eve to send Tobias a message.
episodes.title: Equinox: The Book of Fate

episodes.synopsis: Ignoring Gambi's pleas, Jefferson and Anissa set out to clear Black Lightning's name. Lynn and Jennifer each make a startling discovery.
episodes.title: The Book of Revelation

episodes.synopsis: Jennifer struggles to adjust to her new reality. Jefferson and Anissa connect the dots between Alvin’s research and Green Light. Henderson goes rogue.
episodes.title: The Book of Little Black Lies

episodes.synopsis: As Anissa visits a secret lab linked to a wave of disappearances 30 years ago, another Freeland child is kidnapped. Gambi faces a grueling ordeal.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father: The Book of Redemption

episodes.synopsis: When a conspiracy lands Jefferson behind bars, Anissa and Gambi cook up a distraction for the ASA, and Henderson digs up dirt on his fellow cops.
episodes.title: Black Jesus: The Book of Crucifixion

episodes.synopsis: Ordered to bring Black Lightning in alive, Tobias hatches a plan to draw him out into the open. Khalil returns to Freeland a changed man.
episodes.title: The Resurrection and the Light: The Book of Pain

episodes.synopsis: The showdown at Garfield leaves the Pierce family reeling. But with Proctor and Tobias both on the warpath, they don't have long to regroup.
episodes.title: Shadow of Death: The Book of War

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson finds his job at Garfield in jeopardy, Lynn seeks a way to help the children in the pods, and Jennifer's powers manifest in scary new ways.
episodes.title: The Book of Consequences: Chapter One: The Rise of the Green Light Babies

episodes.synopsis: A teen escapes from her pod and wreaks havoc in Freeland. The Pierces help Issa understand his powers. Anissa makes a romantic connection.
episodes.title: The	Book of Consequences: Chapter Two: Black Jesus Blues

episodes.synopsis: As Jefferson adjusts to his new role, Tobias turns up the heat on Khalil, Anissa vows to save a church clinic, and a stranger reaches out to Jennifer.
episodes.title: The	Book of Consequences: Chapter Three: Master Lowry

episodes.synopsis: Henderson searches for a way to keep Tobias in custody. Tired of her dad's rules, Anissa moves out. Gambi uncovers a plot to attack the clinic.
episodes.title: The	Book of Consequences: Chapter Four: Translucent Freak

episodes.synopsis: Devastating news leaves the Pierces shaken. Anissa witnesses a strange phenomenon at the clinic. Lynn and Dr. Jace make a bid to save the pod kids.
episodes.title: The Book of Blood: Chapter One: Requiem

episodes.synopsis: While Lynn agonizes over the incident at the lab, Anissa makes more unsettling discoveries in South Freeland. Khalil balks at an order from Tobias.
episodes.title: The Book of Blood: Chapter Two: The Perdi

episodes.synopsis: In search of the missing baby, Black Lightning follows the silver trail to Looker's property. Jennifer helps Khalil with his Tobias problem.
episodes.title: The Book of Blood: Chapter Three: The Sange

episodes.synopsis: A risky move by Khalil forces Jennifer to use her powers in public. Meanwhile, Tobias and the Pierces race to find the missing duo.
episodes.title: The Book of Rebellion: Chapter One: Exodus

episodes.synopsis: As Jennifer tends to an injured Khalil, the Pierces -- and Cutter -- scour the surrounding area. Tobias makes an offer to a young tech prodigy.
episodes.title: The	Book of Rebellion: Chapter Two: Gift of Magi

episodes.synopsis: Lynn joins the search and makes a heartfelt plea to Jennifer. Tobias sics Todd on the briefcase's firewall. Jefferson brokers a deal with Henderson.
episodes.title: The	Book of Rebellion: Chapter Three: Angelitos Negros

episodes.synopsis: Armed with intel from Khalil, Jefferson hatches a new plan to take down Tobias. Jennifer begs her mother for help. Todd breaks Dr. Jace out of prison.
episodes.title: The	Book of Secrets: Chapter One: Prodigal Son

episodes.synopsis: As Jennifer works through a whirlwind of emotions, Lynn realizes she's being tailed, and Anissa goes out on a limb to help a woman linked to the 100.
episodes.title: The	Book of Secrets: Chapter Two: Just and Unjust

episodes.synopsis: Odell asks Lynn to help save the pod kids from the Markovians. Tobias wakes up one of his new metas. Anissa makes a startling discovery about Grace.
episodes.title: The	Book of Secrets: Chapter Three: Pillar of Fire

episodes.synopsis: While Jefferson contends with a surprise visit from Lala, Anissa follows a lead on Grace, and Odell pressures Lynn to weaponize the pod kids.
episodes.title: The	Book of Secrets: Chapter Four: Original Sin

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson's new rules for the family leave Jennifer frustrated. To advertise his army, Tobias unleashes a fire-spewing meta on Freeland.
episodes.title: The Book of Apocalypse: Chapter One: The Alpha

episodes.synopsis: Tobias sows chaos in the city as he goes after Black Lightning's power source, and Jennifer seeks redemption after a mission gone awry.
episodes.title: The Book of Apocalypse: Chapter Two: The Omega

episodes.synopsis: With Black Lightning locked up in a testing facility, the ASA tightens its grip on Freeland. Anissa and Gambi work to smuggle metas out of the city.
episodes.title: The Book of Occupation: Chapter One: Birth of Blackbird

episodes.synopsis: Lynn struggles to pull meta Maryam back from the brink. Anissa clashes with the Perdi over the influx of refugees. Odell deploys a new weapon.
episodes.title: The Book of Occupation: Chapter Two: Maryam's Tasbih

episodes.synopsis: Lynn investigates a deadly virus sweeping through the meta camp. Odell recruits Jefferson and Jennifer for separate missions against the Markovians.
episodes.title: The Book of Occupation: Chapter Three: Agent Odell's Pipe-Dream

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to find a cure for the virus, Lynn samples an altered form of Green Light. Jefferson adjusts to the realities of martial law.
episodes.title: The Book of Occupation: Chapter Four: Lynn's Ouroboros

episodes.synopsis: At her father's urging, Anissa takes on a risky mission. Lynn finds a patient who could unlock the meta gene. Henderson sets a secret plan in motion.
episodes.title: The Book of Occupation: Chapter Five: Requiem for Tavon

episodes.synopsis: The ambush leaves Anissa locked in a life-or-death battle. Jennifer breaks into Brandon's apartment to find out what he's up to.
episodes.title: The Book of Resistance: Chapter One: Knocking on Heaven's Door

episodes.synopsis: The resistance ratchets up its fight against the ASA. Gambi and Lynn uncover the truth about Khalil. Anissa asks her father for a favor.
episodes.title: The Book of Resistance: Chapter Two: Henderson's Opus

episodes.synopsis: When the ASA tries to force a teacher out of her home, Jefferson takes a stand. Anissa and Gambi attempt to get a message to the outside world.
episodes.title: The Book of Resistance: Chapter Three: The Battle of Franklin Terrace

episodes.synopsis: As Jennifer wrestles with divided loyalties, a massive storm knocks her into parallel dimensions. Odell moves to weaponize the metas at the camp.
episodes.title: The Book of Resistance: Chapter Four: Earth Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Jennifer returns with a new sense of purpose. TC breaks into Gambi's hideout. Lynn's erratic behavior worries her family.
episodes.title: The Book of Markovia: Chapter One: Blessings and Curses Reborn

episodes.synopsis: Lynn teams up with a rogue ASA agent to sneak into the Pit. Jefferson and Anissa intercept Odell's convoy. Jennifer comes face-to-face with Khalil.
episodes.title: The Book of Markovia: Chapter Two: Lynn's Addiction

episodes.synopsis: As Dr. Jace tries to coax Lynn to give up the stabilization formula, Jefferson and Anissa assemble a rescue team, and TC ventures into Khalil's brain.
episodes.title: The Book of Markovia: Chapter Three: Motherless ID

episodes.synopsis: Tensions flare as the squad trains for its mission. A new Markovian commander turns his mind control powers on Lynn. Khalil weighs his next move.
episodes.title: The Book of Markovia: Chapter Four: Grab the Strap

episodes.synopsis: As the Pierces hit the reset button, the Perdi come under attack, Khalil begins to glitch, and Gambi uncovers the identity of the first meta.
episodes.title: The Book of War: Chapter One: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: With help from Lynn's serum, Gravedigger prepares to invade Freeland. Anissa and Grace plan a big night for the family. Jennifer goes rogue.
episodes.title: The Book of War: Chapter Two: Freedom Ain't Free

episodes.synopsis: The ASA scrambles to cover its tracks as the Pierces and their allies square off against Gravedigger in a showdown that will change Freeland forever.
episodes.title: The Book of War: Chapter Three: Liberation

episodes.synopsis: A year after the Markovian conflict, Jefferson and family clash over whether — and how — to keep fighting for Freeland. Tobias emerges in a new role.
episodes.title: The Book of Reconstruction: Chapter One: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: As the war between the 100 and the Kobra Cartel rages on, three of the Pierces flock to the scene of a shootout. Anissa befriends a new co-worker.
episodes.title: The Book of Reconstruction: Chapter Two: Unacceptable Losses

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson discovers that Lala's running a fight club, Jen sets out to debunk a misleading news report, and Gambi gets his hands on a powerful weapon.
episodes.title: The Book of Reconstruction: Chapter Three: Despite All My Rage...

episodes.synopsis: Jefferson's secret hobby leads to more trouble at home. Anissa enjoys a new beginning. Chaos erupts as the mayor gives his big speech.
episodes.title: The Book of Reconstruction: Chapter Four: A Light in the Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to help Jen, Jefferson travels to the ionosphere, while Gambi and TC prepare a particle condenser. Chief Lopez accuses Lightning of murder.
episodes.title: The Book of Ruin: Chapter One: Picking Up the Pieces

episodes.synopsis: As the family adjusts to the aftermath of Jen's accident, Tobias makes a surprise announcement, and Destiny and Lala square off in an epic showdown.
episodes.title: The Book of Ruin: Chapter Two: Theseus's Ship

episodes.synopsis: On her honeymoon, Anissa comes face to face with Khalil, who struggles to keep Painkiller in check. Grace is kidnapped by a band of crypto-criminals.
episodes.title: Painkiller

episodes.synopsis: The FBI investigates Jefferson on embezzlement charges, "JJ" makes a friend on her first day at school, and Lynn discovers Val's secret power.
episodes.title: The Book of Ruin: Chapter Three: Things Fall Apart

episodes.synopsis: A livestream lands Lightning in more trouble. Jefferson races to track down Ishmael, the meta hunter. Lynn gets a rude surprise at work.
episodes.title: The Book of Ruin: Chapter Four: Lyding

episodes.synopsis: As Gambi tries to figure out why the Pierces have lost their powers, an old friend arrives to help Lynn, and Anissa learns the truth about the clinic.
episodes.title: The Book of Reunification: Chapter One: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Khalil hunts down a dangerous meta at the center of Jefferson and Lynn's legal troubles. Meanwhile, TC sets Jen up on a date with Uriah.
episodes.title: The Book of Reunification: Chapter Two: Trial and Errors

episodes.synopsis: While Anissa plots an attack on Monovista, Jen seeks revenge on Red, and Jefferson prepares to face off with Tobias — with or without his powers.
episodes.title: The Book of Resurrection: Chapter One: Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: In the series finale, revelations and reckonings abound as the Pierces race to regain their powers and end Tobias’ reign of terror.
episodes.title: The Book of Resurrection: Chapter Two: Closure
